title: Fantasy Best Ball 2022 Preview
description:
Daniel Dopp, Mike Clay and Al Zeidenfeld preview the key strategies for Fantasy Best Ball in the 2022 NFL season including the rules, how to approach drafting stacks and when to target certain types of players at each position.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
